verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
THINK ABOUT HIS LOVE
(echo)
Think about His mercy, (echo)
Think about His grace that's brought us through.
For as high as the heavens above,
So great is the measure of our Father's love,
Great is the measure of our Father's love.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
How could I forget His love
How could I forget His mercy.
He satisfies, He satisfies, He satisfies my desires.
Great is the measure of our Father's love.
(Repeat first verse)

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Even when I've strayed away,
His tender love has sought me out;
And found me, He found me, and carried me back
home. Great is the measure of our Father's love.
(Repeat first verse)
